section.title: New IPO Consultant with
section.description: Global Sinergi Kapital emerges as a newly established IPO consultant with an experienced professional team. We bring innovative approaches and modern solutions to help Indonesian companies access the capital market more efficiently and effectively.

description.main: RITZ Corp is an integrated business that has two main business lines, namely Financial and Business Consulting. PT RITZ Corpora Indonesia ("PT RCI") is managed by RITZ Corp, which offers Corporate Law Services through RITZ & Partners Law Firm ("R&P") and Commercial Litigation Services through RITZ Law Firm ("RLF").

step1.title: Client-Focused Solutions
step1.description: In addressing the needs of our clients, we assemble specialized teams that are tailored to meet the specific business requirements of our clients. This ensures that our services effectively assist our clients in overcoming all challenges.

step2.title: Customized Advisory Services
step2.description: As your business expands, our advisory services are designed to aid you in developing customized solutions that align with your unique requirements and goals within your organization. Successful growth often involves navigating a complex landscape.

step3.title: Strategic Guidance
step3.description: We will guide you through various scenarios, recommending measures and actions to ensure offering and position your business for a better future. Our plans will support your current business needs but also consider where you aspire to be in the future.

step4.title: Comprehensive Support
step4.description: Regardless of the scale of your major transaction, we will work with and receive support from our dedicated professionals who generate value about your business and its long-term success.
